Amazon's physical stores segment, which consists primarily of Whole Foods locations but also includes the company's Amazon Fresh supermarkets and Amazon Go convenience stores, saw its revenue exceed $20 billion for the first time in fiscal 2023, an increase from $17.2 billion in 2019.
